queries.freeText: We provide AI-driven analytics platforms for healthcare providers. Find hospitals and healthcare companies that recently announced AI partnerships, technology investments, or are hiring data scientists.
Our company sells cybersecurity solutions for fintech startups. Looking for Series A/B funded fintech companies in the US that are expanding their engineering teams.
We offer cloud infrastructure monitoring tools. Find SaaS companies that recently migrated to cloud platforms, adopted Kubernetes, or hired DevOps engineers.
Our platform provides analytics for e-commerce businesses. Target online retailers that launched new product lines, raised funding, or announced partnerships in the last 30 days.
We sell recruiting software to fast-growing startups. Find companies that recently raised Series A funding and are actively hiring across multiple departments.
Our company provides data engineering platforms. Looking for companies hiring data engineers, analytics engineers, or building data teams.
We offer marketing automation for B2B SaaS. Find companies that appointed new CMOs or VPs of Marketing, or launched new go-to-market initiatives.
Our platform helps manage remote teams. Target companies announcing remote-first policies, opening new offices, or expanding globally.
We provide compliance software for financial services. Find banks and fintech companies facing regulatory changes, hiring compliance officers, or investing in RegTech.
Our tool optimizes supply chain operations. Looking for manufacturing and logistics companies adopting AI, partnering with tech vendors, or modernizing their tech stack.
We sell customer support automation software. Find SaaS companies that are scaling support teams, integrating chatbots, or launching new support initiatives.
Our platform provides API infrastructure for developers. Target companies building developer tools, launching APIs, or hiring backend engineers.

annotatedSignals.signalText: Acme Healthcare announced a $50M partnership with Google Cloud to deploy AI diagnostics across 200 hospitals.
FinSecure raised $30M Series B led by Andreessen Horowitz to expand its fraud detection platform.
CloudOps Inc is hiring 15 DevOps engineers and SREs for its new monitoring product team.
RetailHub launched a new analytics dashboard for Shopify merchants, powered by real-time data pipelines.
TalentAI appointed Sarah Johnson as VP of Engineering to scale the recruiting platform.
DataFlow announced it is migrating from PostgreSQL to Snowflake to support enterprise customers.
MarketGrow named John Doe as Chief Marketing Officer, replacing the previous CMO who left last month.
RemoteFirst Inc opened a new office in Austin and announced plans to double headcount by Q4.
FinCompliance hired 10 compliance analysts to meet new SEC regulatory requirements.
LogiChain partnered with AWS to build an AI-powered supply chain optimization platform.
SupportBot integrated GPT-4 into its chatbot product, reducing response times by 60%.
DevInfra launched a new GraphQL API gateway targeting enterprise developers.
MediTech announced layoffs affecting 20% of workforce due to budget constraints.
SecureBank postponed its cloud migration project indefinitely citing security concerns.
RetailCo faces lawsuits over data breaches affecting millions of customers.
TechStart announced plans to explore strategic alternatives including potential sale.
CloudVendor reported quarterly losses and scaled back hiring plans for 2024.
DataCorp CEO resigned amid shareholder disputes over company strategy.
AutoSupply delayed its AI rollout after pilot testing revealed accuracy issues.
SaasPro shut down its European operations and consolidated teams in the US.
FinPayments withdrew its IPO plans citing unfavorable market conditions.
GrowthCo is hiring across all departments to support expansion into APAC markets.
APIVendor published case studies showing 10x performance improvements for Fortune 500 clients.
HealthOS acquired MedData for $100M to expand its analytics capabilities.
EcommHub raised $20M seed round from Y Combinator to build vertical SaaS for retailers.
SecureNet is building a new SOC (Security Operations Center) and hiring 25 security engineers.
MarketPlace announced beta launch of AI-powered recommendation engine.
BizOps hired former Salesforce VP as Chief Revenue Officer.
LogiFlow partnered with FedEx to pilot autonomous delivery routing.
DataPipe is migrating 50 enterprise customers from Redshift to BigQuery.
